title: The Burren
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Irish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Irish pub and restaurant. Offers traditional Irish and American dishes with marked vegetarian dishes, including a lemony lentil vegetable stew and a spicy red beans and brown rice. Let your server know if you are vegan. Live entertainment night - check webpage for schedule. Has Wi-Fi.
